title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-3.1 - General Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-3.1 - General Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to preserve and protect the
water quality and ecology of Lake George and protect the health, safety and welfare
of residents and visitors to the Lake George basin by ensuring compliance with
design and maintenance standards for wastewater treatment systems, providing
consistent review of such systems, and optimizing the efficacy of these systems to
prevent degradation of the Lake from wastewater pollution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register April 5, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 14, eff. 4/5/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
